content:
While trying to figure out an error, I went through the documentation again and figured out my folder structure was different. Later seeing this message I realized this part needs to be updated (see link below).

image.png

folder "fsh" should be under "input", so this part needs to change accordingly
image.png

https://fshschool.org/docs/sushi/configuration/
from :
"Look for <root>/ig.ini, where <root> is the folder containing the fsh subdirectory."
to:
"Look for <root>/ig.ini, where <root>/input is the folder containing the fsh subdirectory."

(I'd suggest something like this, which to me is more understandable):
"Look for <root>/ig.ini, where <root> is the folder containing the _input_ folder, which itself includes other subfolders such as fsh."
You are correct! Thank you for pointing it out and we apologize for the confusion it caused!
not a problem at all, the community should work hand-in-hand to help you guys who put a lot of time developing these tools. Thanks to you all !
